author: Ella Torres
title: Hobby Lobby closes its stores after defying coronavirus stay-at-home orders
description: Hobby Lobby closes its stores after defying coronavirus orders
content:
Hobby Lobby finally closed all of its stores in the U.S. after the craft supplies company received backlash for staying open in at least one state amid the novel coronavirus pandemic.
Nearly all of the store employees will be furloughed, as well as a large p… [+2129 chars]
